QuestData.Title: Message for Saurfang
QuestData.Description: <The Darkspear loyalist opens the package and reads the letter within. As she finishes the note from Thrall, a hint of a fanged smile appears on her face.>$B$BYa should take dis directly to Saurfang inside Orgrimmar. Be sure ta let him know dat de package be from Thrall.$B$BTake me raptor. Hurry, little one, dere be no time ta waste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the SI:7 Emblem to High Overlord Saurfang at Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is this, goblin? You are not from these parts.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is from Thrall?
<Saurfang rubs his chin in thought.>
I understand the meaning of this clearly.
There are other goblins that are working in Azshara that you could visit and get your bearings. <Saurfang points to Gobber.> We found this one wandering the city and he seems to recognize you. He might want to go with you.
From this day on, you and the Bilgewater Cartel are one with the Horde!
